languages.text: "Впрочем, возможно, у вас найдутся {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}полезные знакомые{/d}, которые смогут помочь несчастному Херимону".
"Perhaps you have some {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}useful contacts{/d} at your disposal who could assist the unfortunate Herimon with his situation."
languages.original_text: "Впрочем, возможно, у вас найдутся {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}полезные знакомые{/d}, которые смогут помочь несчастному Херимону".

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps you have some {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}useful contacts{/d} at your disposal who could assist Herimon in his situation."

"Perhaps you have some {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}useful contacts{/d} at your disposal who could assist the unfortunate Herimon with his situation."

languages.text: "Vielleicht habt Ihr ja einige {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}hilfreiche Kontakte{/d}, die dem bedauernswerten Herimon unter die Arme greifen könnten."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you have some {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}useful contacts{/d} at your disposal who could assist the unfortunate Herimon with his situation."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht habt Ihr ja einige {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}hilfreiche Kontakte{/d}, die dem bedauernswerten Herimon unter die Arme greifen könnten."

languages.text: « Peut-être avez-vous dans votre manche des {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}contacts utiles{/d} qui pourraient venir en aide à ce pauvre Herimon. »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you have some {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}useful contacts{/d} at your disposal who could assist the unfortunate Herimon with his situation."

traits.locale_text: « Peut-être avez-vous dans votre manche des {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}contacts utiles{/d} qui pourraient venir en aide à ce pauvre Herimon. »

languages.text: «Tal vez tenga algún {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}contacto útil{/d} que nos permita ayudar al pobre Herimon con su situación».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you have some {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}useful contacts{/d} at your disposal who could assist the unfortunate Herimon with his situation."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez tenga algún {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}contacto útil{/d} que nos permita ayudar al pobre Herimon con su situación».

languages.text: 「おそらくだが、不運なヘリモンの状況を何とかしてくれる{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}有益な人脈{/d}があるのだろう」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you have some {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}useful contacts{/d} at your disposal who could assist the unfortunate Herimon with his situation."

traits.locale_text: 「おそらくだが、不運なヘリモンの状況を何とかしてくれる{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}有益な人脈{/d}があるのだろう」

languages.text: “或许您认识某些{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}有用的联络人{/d}，他们可以协助不幸的赫瑞蒙摆脱困境。”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you have some {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}useful contacts{/d} at your disposal who could assist the unfortunate Herimon with his situation."

traits.locale_text: “或许您认识某些{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}有用的联络人{/d}，他们可以协助不幸的赫瑞蒙摆脱困境。”

languages.text: "Belki zavallı Herimon'a içinde bulunduğu koşullarda yardım eli uzatacak, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}işe yarar bağlantılarınız{/d} vardır."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you have some {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}useful contacts{/d} at your disposal who could assist the unfortunate Herimon with his situation."
